mapper.sql: id, scene_id, scene_name, start_time, end_time, `status`,`type`, conclusion, total_request,pressure_type,avg_concurrent, tps,avg_tps, avg_rt, concurrent, success_rate, sa, operate_id,features, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_update,customer_id,amount,dept_id,user_id,script_id
mapper.select: select id, scene_id, scene_name, start_time, end_time, `status`, operate_id, features, amount, customer_id from t_report where scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and `status` = 0 order by id desc limit 1
select id, scene_id, scene_name, start_time, end_time, `status`, operate_id, features, amount, customer_id from t_report where job_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id desc limit 1

select id, scene_id, scene_name, start_time, end_time, pressure_type, avg_concurrent, tps, `status`, operate_id, amount, customer_id, resource_id, job_id from t_report where scene_id = #{sceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0 order by id desc limit 1
